TR.A.L.I.C.
Overview About Logout

MEET THE TEAM

Group 3

Behind the creation of TR.A.L.I.C. is an aspiring group that created the project in hopes of creating an eco-friendly robot. The group has 3 developers currently studying BS Computer Engineering in De La Salle Lipa. The group planned to create a machine that is capable of automatically collecting with minimal human input.
